channel.title: Chico on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Chico on My New Hugo Site

item.title: I See This Dog Everywhere
item.description: [big]If there’s a fact you probably don’t know about me yet but should, it’s this: I friggin’ love stock photos. Stock photos are air in my life, a way to express emotion vicariously through someone else’s ideas, a way to express a basic idea with just a few pictures, and a way to simply add elements to any photoillustration idea that comes to mind.[/big] And to me, the greatest stock photo resource ever created is a wonderful dog named Chico.
